ui_surfaces.navigation_path: Profiler -> Profiler Configuration -> Additional Data Collectors Configuration

inputs.name: MDM Authentication Server
inputs.help_text: Select an MDM authentication server for accurate profiling of mobile devices registered through MDM providers.

inputs.name: LDAP Server
inputs.help_text: Select an LDAP server where device information is stored.

actions.description: Saves the configuration settings for additional data collectors.

constraints: MDM authentication server must be configured for accurate profiling of mobile devices.
LDAP server must be configured to store device information.
Refer to Pulse Policy Secure Administrator Guide for configuring Authentication Servers.
